tasks.label: Test AutoZomato Extension
tasks.command: echo 'To test the extension:' && echo '1. Open Chrome and go to chrome://extensions/' && echo '2. Enable Developer mode' && echo '3. Click "Load unpacked" and select this folder' && echo '4. The extension should load with enhanced processing and reporting features' && echo '5. Check that auto-start toggle is available in settings' && echo '6. URLs from settings.json should be loaded automatically'
